description:
With Kouhei at death’s door, Hazuki agonizes over her attempt to kill him and is haunted by the relentless voice of her alter-ego, Mistress Luna. Is it truly her fate to lead a cursed life?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yurusanai... Hajimete no Shimobe no Kuse ni
ゆるさない... 初めてのシモベのくせに
